vote.title: Appointment of Zachary Woodruff, Chief Real Estate Development Officer, Columbus State Community College, 550 E. Spring Street, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the RiverSouth Development Authority Board of Trustees as a citizen member with a term expiration date of June 22, 2025, but shall continue to hold over into one or more subsequent terms until a new citizen member is duly appointed or elected to serve for the remainder of such term. (résumé attached)
vote.description:
Title
 
Appointment of Zachary Woodruff, Chief Real Estate Development Officer, Columbus State Community College, 550 E. Spring Street, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the RiverSouth Development Authority Board of Trustees as a citizen member with a term expiration date of June 22, 2025, but shall continue to hold over into one or more subsequent terms until a new citizen member is duly appointed or elected to serve for the remainder of such term. (résumé attached)
